milestones.description: Zaheer Abbas has broken the record for most sixes (8) in ODIs for PAK, going past Majid Khan's 6
Roy Dias has become the top scorer for SL in ODIs with 243 runs, going past Warnapura's 170
Zaheer Abbas has scored 2 hundreds in ODIs, the most for PAK breaking Majid Khan's record
Roy Dias has scored 3 fifty-plus scores in ODIs, the most for SL breaking Wettimuny's record
Zaheer Abbas's 123 is the highest individual score in ODIs (for PAK), surpassing Majid Khan's 109
Zaheer Abbas has broken the record for most runs in boundaries (78) in an innings in ODIs for PAK, going past Majid Khan's 70
Roy Dias has broken the record for most runs in boundaries (48) in an innings in ODIs for SL, going past Warnapura's 40
Warnapura has broken the record for most ODIs (5) as captain for SL, going past Tennekoon
Zaheer Abbas and Haroon Rasheed's 123-run partnership is PAK's highest for the 4th wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 88 between Majid Khan and Javed Miandad
Javed Miandad has broken the record for playing the most ODIs (31) for PAK, going past Wasim Raja
de Silva has broken the record for playing the most ODIs (9) for SL, going past Warnapura
